name: rashid
bio: ”The Soaring Eagle of the Desert” that fights using parkour. With the wind as his ally, he outfoxes opponents with his high mobility. Born into nobility, he's a carefree but earnest man. Loves video streaming.
notlike: Fighting women and children,load times, trolls

moves.definition: While jumping, kick off a wall to perform another jump.

moves.definition: Unleash multiple chops while spinning. Useful for combos and sequences, it also makes for a great anti-air attack.

moves.definition: Bound forward while delivering a powerful flying kick. Deals high damage and is easy to use to tack on an additional hit at the end of a combo.

moves.definition: Spin around quickly to whip up a whirlwind before launching it with a kick. Can be powered up by holding the attack button.

moves.definition: A spinning kick attack that summons up a whirlwind in front of you. The move can be followed up with two different movement techniques.

moves.definition: Perform a spinning kick in mid-air that creates an air current that you then use to perform a mid-air jump. It's possible to perform jump attacks after the mid-air jump.

moves.definition: Offload a devastating kick while soaring forward and up through the air. Landing the initial hit on a grounded opponent will increase the move's damage.

moves.name: Ysaar
moves.definition: Kick out with both legs to create a large advancing whirlwind. Movements or special moves that make contact with the whirlwind will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Altair
moves.definition: Twirl around and summon a whirlwind that lifts up your opponent, before Rashid barrages them with a series of powerful blows. A versatile move, perfect for combos, reversals, and as a way of dealing with projectiles.

moves.name: Spin Drive Smasher
moves.definition: A forward-moving combination attack consisting of a Spiral Arrow followed by a Cannon Spike. It has invincibility on startup, making it useful for turning the tables.

moves.name: Killer Bee Spin
moves.definition: Jump into the air, seize your opponent with a quick descending kick, and perform a chokehold on them. This move executes quickly, making it easy to combo into from grounded moves.

moves.name: Aerial Killer Bee Spin
moves.definition: Performed while airborne, seize your opponent with a quick descending kick and perform a chokehold on them. Easy to combo into from aerial specials.

moves.name: Delta Red Assault
moves.definition: Send your opponent to their knees with a series of high-speed attacks and finish with a powerful kick. A highly versatile move, useful both in combos and as a way of dealing with projectiles.

name: lily
bio: A descendant of the Thunderfoot tribe, Lily speaks with the spirits of nature, trusting in their guidance as she travels the globe. Don't judge a book by its cover—her small stature conceals truly titanic power.

moves.name: Condor Wind
moves.definition: Twirl your clubs above your head to summon and envelop yourself in wind. This will grant you one Windclad stock, which powers up certain special moves.

moves.name: Condor Spire
moves.definition: Leap into the air and charge forward while remaining low to the ground. Useful as a way of approaching from a distance.

moves.name: Tomahawk Buster
moves.definition: Use the momentum of swinging your arms to diagonally leap into the air with a tackle. It is invincible against jumping attacks, making it useful as an anti-air attack.

moves.name: Mexican Typhoon
moves.definition: Grab your opponent with both war clubs and smash them into the ground with a spinning slam. Useful for slipping through an opponent's guard at close range.

moves.name: Breezing Hawk
moves.definition: After the attack begins, you'll unleash a series of spinning attacks centered around your opponent. It is slow to come out, but it does lots of damage and is invincible at the start.

moves.name: Thunderbird
moves.definition: Remaining in place, leap directly upwards while unleashing a series of spinning attacks. It executes quickly, making it useful as an anti-air attack or as a way to turn the tables while doing lots of damage.

moves.name: Soaring Thunderbird
moves.definition: Thunderbird performed while airborne. It is primarily useful as a way to finish air combos.

moves.name: Raging Typhoon
moves.definition: A more powerful Mexican Typhoon in which you smash your opponent into the ground twice. Can be used to slip through an opponent's guard at close range and deal tons of damage all at once.

moves.name: Siberian Express
moves.definition: Run to an opponent and grab them before slamming them to the ground with a devastating powerbomb. When you're at a longer distance from the opponent, this is useful for making a surprise attack or breaking through their blocks.

moves.name: Aerial Russian Slam
moves.definition: Jump diagonally upward, grabbing an airborne opponent before viciously slamming them into the ground. Useful as an anti-air counter when predicting your opponent's jumps or when worked into combos.

moves.name: Cyclone Lariat

moves.name: Bolshoi Storm Buster
moves.definition: A powerful throw that puts an opponent in a finishing hold with pro-wrestling flair. Can be used to slip through an opponent's guard at close range and deliver massive damage.

moves.name: Show of Force

moves.name: Ultimate Killer Head Ram
moves.definition: Perform a headbutt followed by a sequence of slaps, and finish off with a final twisting headbutt. The initial headbutt travels a long distance, making it excellent both in combos and as a way of dealing with projectiles.

moves.name: The Final Bout
moves.definition: Swing your opponent in a circle to draw the outline of a sumo ring, then just as you're about to push them out of it, throw them to the ground behind you with a brutal slam. This move has long reach and comes out quickly, making it quite versatile.

moves.name: Merciless Yoga

moves.name: Wild Hunt
moves.definition: Leap at an opponent, pin them down, and scratch them multiple times. Useful for slipping through the guard of opponents who are committed to blocking.

moves.name: Shout of Earth
moves.definition: Leap into the air and slam both fists into the ground, creating a powerful electric shock. Its invincibility makes it useful for turning the tables, but it is also effective in combos.

moves.name: Lightning Beast
moves.definition: Electrically charge your own body to power up your special moves and Super Arts. It also enables the use of Rolling Cannon from all rolling-type special moves.

moves.name: Ground Shave Cannonball
moves.definition: Leap onto your opponent and bite them multiple times before slamming into them with an electrically charged spinning tackle. The leap performed upon activation can be used to deal with projectiles.

moves.name: Dragon Sweep
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Sonic Boom
moves.definition: Cross your arms with such speed that you fire a rotating aerial slash. Useful for checking distant opponents or as a way to start offensive pressure.

moves.name: Somersault Kick
moves.definition: Perform a backwards somersault while unleashing a devastating kick. It is invincible against jumping attacks, making it useful as an anti-air technique.

moves.name: Sonic Blade
moves.definition: Used to fire aerial slashes while Solid Puncher is active. The speed of the projectile can be modified with directional inputs.

moves.name: Sonic Cross
moves.definition: Combine Sonic Blade with another aerial slash and fire it as a projectile.

moves.name: Sonic Break
moves.definition: Used to fire aerial slashes while Solid Puncher is active. Can be repeated up to 4 times, and can also be input following a Sonic Boom for additional attacks.

moves.name: Sonic Hurricane
moves.definition: Fire a massive aerial slash directly ahead. An extremely versatile move that can be used in combos, to counter projectiles, or as a way to turn the tables when being pressured. The angle of the attack can be changed depending on the command input.

moves.name: Solid Puncher
moves.definition: Envelop both arms in aerial slashes and enables the use of Sonic Break.

moves.name: Crossfire Somersault
moves.definition: Launch your opponent into the air and follow up with a mighty somersault kick. It has invincibility at the beginning, making it useful as an anti-air attack or as a way to turn the tables on your opponent.

name: chunli
bio: A former high-kicking ICPO agent, Chun-Li looks after Li-Fen, a victim of the Black Moon Incident. With Shadaloo sundered, she now runs kung fu classes, and has become a well-loved member of the local community.

moves.name: Wall Jump
moves.definition: While jumping, kick off a wall to perform another jump.

moves.name: Kikoken
moves.definition: Fire a ki blast directly forward. Useful for attacking opponents at range.

moves.name: Hundred Lightning Kicks
moves.definition: Unleash a series of high-speed kicks. Useful for creating combos out of normal attacks.

moves.name: Aerial Hundred Lightning Kicks
moves.definition: A Hundred Lightning Kicks performed while jumping. Effective when used to convert a jumping attack into a combo.

moves.name: Spinning Bird Kick
moves.definition: A series of rotating, upside-down kicks with your legs extended wide. This move does lots of damage, and is useful when performing combos against opponents that have left themselves wide open.

moves.name: Hazanshu
moves.definition: Leap forward, rotate in the air, and slam your leg downward with a powerful kick. Useful for checking an opponent's sweeps, or as a way to close distance.

moves.name: Tensho Kicks
moves.definition: Rise into the air with multiple kicks. Useful for countering an opponent's jumping attacks, or as a way to close out combos.

moves.name: Kikosho
moves.definition: Create a mass of energy directly in front of you. Its swift speed and invulnerability can quickly turn the tables on an opponent.

moves.name: Aerial Kikosho
moves.definition: Fire a kikosho diagonally downward while jumping. Effective when used to convert a jumping attack into a combo.

moves.name: Hoyoku-sen
moves.definition: Move forward while unleashing a series of kicks and then launch your opponent into the air. The last hit can be immediately canceled into a jump.

moves.name: Soten Ranka
moves.definition: Perform a roundhouse kick, knock your opponent into the air with a series of attacks, and then smash them with a devastating kick. Useful for tacking on big damage in a combo, or as a quick way to turn the tables.

name: jamie
bio: This self-styled Chinatown peacekeeper aspires to the example set by Yun and Yang, the Twin Dragons. An expert dancer, Jamie places justice and friendship above all else, defending his town with martial skill.

Changes to Level 2 version if the button is held for more than 8 frames and then released.
Changes to Level 3 version if the button is held for more than 38 frames and then released.
Invincible to strikes and throws from frame 2 to frame 8.
Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 40%.

moves.name: [Denjin Charge]SA2 Shin Hashogeki（Lv3）
moves.miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frame 1 to frame 9.Hold down the button to change the properties of this move.
Changes to Level 2 version if the button is held for more than 8 frames and then released.
Changes to Level 3 version if the button is held for more than 38 frames and then released.
Invincible to strikes and throws from frame 2 to frame 8.
Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 40%.

moves.name: SA3 Shin Shoryuken
moves.miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frame 1 to frame 16.Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 50%.
Note: Can only be canceled into from special moves.

moves.name: CA Shin Shoryuken
moves.miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frame 1 to frame 16.Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 50%.
Note: Can only be canceled into from special moves.

moves.definition: Grab your opponent and—bearing the brunt of their weight with your arm and back—toss them forward. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.
moves.name: Shoulder Throw
moves.miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

moves.definition: Grab your opponent, place your foot on their torso, and throw them behind you as you fall backwards. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.
moves.name: Somersault Throw
moves.miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

moves.name: Backward Dash
moves.miscellaneous: Invincible to throws from frame 1 to frame 15.

moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.
moves.name: Drive Impact: Shingeki
moves.miscellaneous:
Super Armor for 2 hits from frames 1 - 27Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, or after the Super Armor absorbs a hit:
- Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground
- Forces a spinning knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent
- Super Art gauge increases by 3000

moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.
moves.note: When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry
moves.name: Drive Reversal: Chest Strike
moves.miscellaneous:
Recoverable damageCompletely invincible from frames 1 - 22
5 frames of recovery added on hit

moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.
moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.miscellaneous:
Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive RushParry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held
Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period
Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

moves.name: Perfect Parry (strike)
moves.miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameFully invincible for 6 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry)
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

moves.name: Perfect Parry (projectile)
moves.miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameNo screen freeze occurs.
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.
moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 10th frameCan be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame

moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.
moves.note: While connecting with a special-cancelable move
moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 9th frameCan be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame

moves.name: Low Spinning Sweep
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Fuwa Triple Strike
moves.definition: A multi-hit attack that doesn't leave you wide open even if stopped partway through.

moves.name: Hadoken
moves.definition: Fire a ki blast directly forward. Useful for attacking opponents at range.

moves.name: Shoryuken
moves.definition: Leap into the air and perform a powerful uppercut. A Shoryuken is invincible to an opponent's jumping attacks, making it a great anti-air tool.

moves.name: Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
moves.definition: Unleash a series of roundhouse kicks while moving forward. A useful attack for knocking opponents away.

moves.name: High Blade Kick
moves.definition: A thrust kick that quickly closes distance, and can be used to surprise an opponent between their attacks. Strike with the tip of the foot for maximum effectiveness.

moves.name: Hashogeki
moves.definition: Concentrate ki in the palm and unleash it directly forward. Useful as a follow-up after blocks and combos.

moves.name: Shinku Hadoken
moves.definition: A Hadoken in which the body's ki is concentrated and condensed into your palms before firing. Its swift speed and invulnerability can quickly turn the tables on an opponent.

moves.name: Shin Hashogeki
moves.definition: A Hashogeki enhanced through spiritual focus. Hold the button to charge the attack and increase its power.

moves.name: Shin Shoryuken
moves.definition: A powerful Shoryuken unleashed at short range. An overwhelming technique that aims for an opponent's vitals.
